title: Rek'Sai Champion Selection
body:
Rek'Sai is on free week rotation so I've been trying her, every time I click her during Champion Select it reminds me of Clickers from the Last of Us, is it just me or what xD

By the way it's my first post on the new Boards

replies.body: I have no idea what Clickers is.
I wonder if that's what inspired the sounds for Rek'Sai, I also want to know how they made the sound, if it was by computer or people
